speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: What the hell do you want? I'm sick of this crap!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand you're frustrated. I'm calling regarding your overdue account.

speaker: Customer
text: Yeah? And what gives you the right to bother me? You are all a bunch of idiots!

speaker: Agent
text: I assure you that we're here to help. Can I get your account number to assist you further?

speaker: Customer
text: You think I'm just going to give you my info? Screw you!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your hesitation; however, I need that to proceed. Your current balance is fifty dollars.

speaker: Customer
text: I don't care about that! Just stop calling me already!

speaker: Agent
text: I can help you set up a payment plan if that works for you. Let's find a solution.

speaker: Customer
text: Solution? You're just a leech! Leave me the hell alone!

speaker: Agent
text: I truly apologize for the inconvenience. My goal is to help you resolve this matter efficiently.

speaker: Customer
text: I don't need your help! Just f*** off!

speaker: Agent
text: I respect your feelings. If you need assistance in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your time. Have a good day.
